verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Take me mould me
Use me fill me
I give my life
To the Potter's hand
Call me guide me
Lead me walk beside me
I give my life
To the Potter's hand

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Beautiful Lord
Wonderful Saviour
I know for sure
All of my days
Are held in Your hand
Crafted into Your perfect plan

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
You gently call me
Into Your presence
Guiding me by
Your Holy Spirit
Teach me dear Lord
To live all of my life
Through Your eyes

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
I'm captured by Your Holy calling
Set me apart I know You're drawing
Me to Yourself
Lead me Lord I pray
